TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IChannel implements class System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject

summary.span: 定义所有通道对象都必须实现的基本接口。

span.span: Defines the basic interface that all channel objects must implement.

summary.span: 它要求通道对象实现由所有通信对象共享的状态机接口，还要求通道对象实现从通道堆栈中检索对象的方法。

span.span: It requires that they implement the state machine interface shared by all communication objects and that they implement a method to retrieve objects from the channel stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE [untrusted-data-interface-note](~/includes/untrusted-data-interface-note.md)] 通道必须满足 接口所定义的状态机协定。Channels must satisfy the contract of a state machine as defined by the interface. 接口将The interface adds the 方法添加到 接口。 method to the interface. 此方法提供了从通道堆栈中检索属性的机制，无论这些属性存在于堆栈的任何位置，该机制都适用。This method provides a mechanism for retrieving properties from the channel stack regardless of where in the stack those properties live. 方法名称中的术语“属性”是指属于堆栈中某个通道的信息片段。The term "property" in the method name refers to a piece of information that belongs to one of the channels in the stack. 该属性的 CLR 类型由 `T` 确定。The CLR type for that property is determined by `T`. 此检索方法还用在通道工厂和通道侦听器中。This method of retrieval is also used on channel factories and channel listeners. `IChannel` 由基本消息交换模式的每个关联通道接口继承：`IChannel` is inherited by each of the channel interfaces associated with the basic message-exchange patterns: - 用于接收消息。 for receiving messages. - 用于发送消息。 for sending messages. - 用于发送请求。 for sending a request. - 用于发送回复。 for sending a reply. - 用于双向消息传递。 for bi-directional messaging.

MemberSignature.Value: public T GetProperty<T> () where T : class;
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance !!T GetProperty<class T>() cil managed
Public Function GetProperty(Of T As Class) () As T

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 方法正在查询的类型化对象。

span.span: The typed object for which the method is querying.

summary.span: 从通道堆栈的适当层返回所请求的类型化对象（如果存在）。

span.span: Returns a typed object requested, if present, from the appropriate layer in the channel stack.

returns.span: 如果存在，则为所请求的类型化对象 ，如果不存在，则为 。

span.span: The typed object requested if it is present or if it is not.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可请求从通道堆栈的适当层返回一个类型化对象，如用于设置属性或获取状态的接口。Use this to request a typed object such as an interface for setting properties or getting status from the appropriate layer in the channel stack. 如果某个层支持返回所请求的对象，则该层会返回对象。If a layer supports returning the requested object, it returns it. 如果不支持，则该层会将调用委托给堆栈中的下一层。If not, it delegates the call down to the next layer in the stack. 如果到达堆栈底部仍然没有通道层支持所请求的对象，则该方法返回 `null`。If it gets to the bottom of the stack and no channel layer supported the requested object, then the method returns `null`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何实现此属性由通道堆栈使用调用委托给`InnerChannel`检索此通道的内部通道的属性。The following sample shows how this property can be implemented by a channel that delegates the call down the stack using an`InnerChannel` property that retrieves the inner channel for this channel. [!code-csharp[S_UEIChannel#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueichannel/cs/generatedclient.cs#0)]
